results.name: Least nontrivial exponent e such that n is a substring of n^e.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller and Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000. Terms up to a(1000) from Reinhard Zumkeller.

maple: k; end: seq(P(i),i=0..87); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 19 2018
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 2}, While[ StringPosition[ ToString[n^k], ToString[n]] == {}, k++ ]; k]; Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 87}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 09 2005 *)
